net.opentsdb.tools

类 ConfigArgP

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.opentsdb.tools.ConfigArgP

  • public class ConfigArgP
extends Object

    Title: ConfigArgP

    Description: Wraps Config and ArgP instances for a consolidated configuration and command line handler

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem
      Title: ConfigurationItem Description: A container class for deserialized configuration items from opentsdb.conf.json.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected ArgP argp
      The command line argument holder for all (default and extended) options
      protected static Bindings bindings
      The JavaScript bindings
      protected Set<String> commandLineArgs
      The command line args
      protected Config config
      The base configuration
      protected TreeSet<ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem> configItemsByCl
      The raw configuration items loaded from the json file
      protected TreeSet<ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem> configItemsByKey
      The raw configuration items loaded from the json file
      protected ArgP dargp
      The command line argument holder for default options
      protected Map<String,ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem> defaultConfItems
      The default configuration items keyed by the item key and cl-option
      static boolean IS_WINDOWS
      Indicates if we're on Windows, in which case the SysProp handling needs a few tweaks
      static Pattern JS_PATTERN
      The regex pattern to perform a substitution for $[<javascript snippet>] patterns in strings
      protected static org.slf4j.Logger LOG
      Static class logger
      protected String[] nonOptionArgs
      The non config option arguments
      protected static ScriptEngine scriptEngine
      The JavaScript Engine to interpret $[<javascript snippet>] values
      static Pattern SYS_PROP_PATTERN
      The regex pattern to perform a substitution for ${<sysprop>:<default>} patterns in strings
      static String TSD_RPC_ADDIN_CP_KEY
      The config key for the TSD RPC addin classpath
      static String TSD_RPC_ADDIN_KEY
      The config key for the TSD RPC addin classes

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String[] applyArgs(String[] clargs)
      Parses the command line arguments, and where the options are recognized config items, the value is validated, then applied to the config
      static String decodeToken(String key, String defaultValue)
      Attempts to decode the passed dot delimited as a system property, and if not found, attempts a decode as an environmental variable, replacing the dots with underscores. e.g. for the key: buffer.size.max, a system property named buffer.size.max will be looked up, and then an environmental variable named buffer.size.max will be looked up.
      static String evaluate(CharSequence text)
      Evaluates JS expressions defines as configuration values
      ArgP getArgp()
      Returns the command line argument processor
      Config getConfig()
      Returns the TSDB config instance
      ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem getConfigurationItem(String key)
      Returns the ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem with the passed key
      ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem getConfigurationItemByClOpt(String clopt)
      Returns the ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem with the passed cl-option
      ArgP getDargp()
      Returns the command line argument holder for default options
      ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem getDefaultItem(String name)
      Returns the default ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem for the passed name which can be the item's key or cl-option
      String getDefaultUsage(String... msgs)
      Returns a default usage banner with optional prefixed messages, one per line.
      String getExtendedUsage(String... msgs)
      Returns an extended usage banner with optional prefixed messages, one per line.
      String[] getNonOptionArgs()
      Returns the non config option arguments
      boolean hasNonOption(String nonOptionKey)
      Determines if the passed key is contained in the non option args
      boolean isClArg(String arg)
      Indicates if the passed arg was a command line option

      Loads properties from the passed file

      Loads properties from a file or url with the passed name

      Loads properties from the passed input stream
      protected static Properties loadConfig(URL url)
      Loads properties from the passed URL
      protected static void loadConfigSource(ConfigArgP config, String source)
      Applies the properties from the named source to the main configuration
      protected void loadExternalConfigs(Set<ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem> source)
      Loads an externally defined configuration and/or a configuration include
      static void log(String format, Object... args)
      System out logger
      protected void processBindings(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper jsonMapper, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode root)
      Checks the opentsdb.conf.json document to see if it has a bindings segment which contains JS statements to evaluate which will prime variables used by the configuration.
      static String processConfigValue(CharSequence text)
      Performs sys-prop and js evals on the passed value
      static String tokenReplaceSysProps(CharSequence text)
      Replaces all matched tokens with the matching system property value or a configured default

        参数:

      • evaluate

        public static String evaluate(CharSequence text)
        Evaluates JS expressions defines as configuration values
        参数:
        text - The value of a configuration item to evaluate for JS expressions
        返回:
        The passed value with any embedded JS expressions evaluated and replaced

      • decodeToken

        public static String decodeToken(String key,
                                 String defaultValue)
        Attempts to decode the passed dot delimited as a system property, and if not found, attempts a decode as an environmental variable, replacing the dots with underscores. e.g. for the key: buffer.size.max, a system property named buffer.size.max will be looked up, and then an environmental variable named buffer.size.max will be looked up.
        参数:
        key - The dot delimited key to decode
        defaultValue - The default value returned if neither source can decode the key
        返回:
        the decoded value or the default value if neither source can decode the key

      • getArgp

        public ArgP getArgp()
        Returns the command line argument processor
        返回:
        the argp

      • getDargp

        public ArgP getDargp()
        Returns the command line argument holder for default options
        返回:
        the command line argument holder

        public Config getConfig()
        Returns the TSDB config instance
        返回:
        the config

        public String[] getNonOptionArgs()
        Returns the non config option arguments
        返回:
        the non config option arguments

      • getDefaultItem

        public ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem getDefaultItem(String name)
        Returns the default ConfigArgP.ConfigurationItem for the passed name which can be the item's key or cl-option
        参数:
        name - The item's key or cl-option
        返回:
        The named ConfigurationItem or null if one was not found

      • hasNonOption

        public boolean hasNonOption(String nonOptionKey)
        Determines if the passed key is contained in the non option args
        参数:
        nonOptionKey - The non option key to check for
        返回:
        true if the passed key is present, false otherwise

      • isClArg

        public boolean isClArg(String arg)
        Indicates if the passed arg was a command line option
        参数:
        arg - The arg to test for
        返回:
        true if the passed arg was a command line option, false otherwise

      • processBindings

        protected void processBindings(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper jsonMapper,
                               com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode root)
        Checks the opentsdb.conf.json document to see if it has a bindings segment which contains JS statements to evaluate which will prime variables used by the configuration.
        参数:
        jsonMapper - The JSON mapper
        root - The root opentsdb.conf.json document
